attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LyzX2liXcYmYqSJugDk_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Melee Weapon, Damage: 1d8, Damage Type: Slashing, Alternate Damage: 1d10, Alternate Damage Type: Slashing

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LyzXAaR61fy4DKJ3aXQ_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Melee Weapon, Damage: 1d8, Damage Type: Slashing, Alternate Damage: 1d10, Alternate Damage Type: Slashing

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LyzYV9w6L4wIsZ0UiNR_itemcontent
attribs.current: The breastplate and shoulder protectors of this armor are made of leather that has been stiffened by being boiled in oil. The rest of the armor is made of softer and more flexible materials.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LyzZEGZ2Y-bm6OvJ-H0_itemcontent
attribs.current:
Ammunition: You can use a weapon that has the ammunition property to make a ranged attack only if you have ammunition to fire from the weapon. Each time you attack with the weapon, you expend one piece of ammunition. Drawing the ammunition from a quiver, case, or other container is part of the attack. At the end of the battle, you can recover half your expended ammunition by taking a minute to search the battlefield.

If you use a weapon that has the ammunition property to make a melee attack, you treat the weapon as an improvised weapon (see "Improvised Weapons" later in the section). A sling must be loaded to deal any damage when used in this way.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LyzZEGZ2Y-bm6OvJ-H0_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Ranged Weapon, Damage: 1d6, Damage Type: Piercing, Range: 30/120

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LyzZUqiXd3CnDlQQ97U_itemcontent
attribs.current: A backpack can hold one cubic foot or 30 pounds of gear. You can also strap items, such as a bedroll or a coil of rope, to the outside of a backpack.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LyzZYZCPOwQYsMRV7W0_itemcontent
attribs.current: This tin box contains a cup and simple cutlery. The box clamps together, and one side can be used as a cooking pan and the other as a plate or shallow bowl.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LyzZZFjj1CVajUi1Qhh_itemcontent
attribs.current: This small container holds flint, fire steel, and tinder (usually dry cloth soaked in light oil) used to kindle a fire. Using it to light a torch - or anything else with abundant, exposed fuel - takes an action. Lighting any other fire takes 1 minute.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LyzZcmJn6qICmvrzz5v_itemcontent
attribs.current: A torch burns for 1 hour, providing bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet. If you make a melee attack with a burning torch and hit, it deals 1 fire damage.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LyzZcmJn6qICmvrzz5v_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Adventuring Gear, Damage: 1, Damage Type: Fire, Range: 20/40

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LyzZf2SaoP6yRdHlJWI_itemcontent
attribs.current: Rations consist of dry foods suitable for extended travel, including jerky, dried fruit, hardtack, and nuts.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LyzZh1ycF63-q88BQ6n_itemcontent
attribs.current: A waterskin can hold up to 4 pints of liquid.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LyzZjA8xm9ENYgXOTjg_itemcontent
attribs.current: Rope, whether made of hemp or silk, has 2 hit points and can be burst with a DC 17 Strength check.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LyzZSBe5zb0OioK4ZZy_description
attribs.current:
Your walking speed is increased by 5 feet. At 10th level,
this bonus increases to 10 feet. At 18th level, this bonus
increases to 20 feet, and you gain a climbing speed equal
to your walking speed.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LyzZWGcodLqYtawuZOs_description
attribs.current:
You have darkvision, up to a range of 30 feet. At 10th level,
this range increases to 60 feet. At 18th level, this range
increases to 120 feet, and you also gain blindsight to a
range of 30 feet.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LyzZdx7A-JgEkAL4K23_description
attribs.current:
You have advantage on Wisdom (Perception) and Wisdom
(Survival) checks based on smell.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LyzZiZwiyqw7Oi-s48s_description
attribs.current: You are immune to natural diseases.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LyzZs9V9zgerJozANZA_description
attribs.current:
You are completely sterile - you can have no children
through natural means.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LyzZxkJTqQm-kbvPZzg_description
attribs.current:
Your lifespan is extended dramatically - you age at a rate
10 times slower than regular members of your race.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LyzbVej4Oq9tSbEG8Dr_description
attribs.current:
You are resistant to cold
damage, and have advantage on saving throws made
against magical effects.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LyzbkwdFAI6sTp8FtEe_description
attribs.current:
You are considered a dragonborn for
the purposes of qualifying for feats. And are affected
by enchantments specific to dragons as if you were a
dragon.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LyzbphV6bxy3IETifvt_description
attribs.current:
Creatures other than dragons
have disadvantage on saving throws against illusion
spells cast by you.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LyzbzDFAzraX4hRkqMA_description
attribs.current:
You can cast the feather fall
spell on yourself once per day, however you cannot
target additional creatures when using this feature.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-Lyzc4cbPDZNLxHjewmU_description
attribs.current:
have advantage on deception
checks made to hide your appearance or appear as an
ordinary human, and you may add deception to your
class skills.
